ch0076_00_collector/2701_1031_01_10:
I want to fill in the blank
spots in my Pokédex.
ch0076_00_collector/2701_1031_02_10:
I just can’t find some
Legendary Pokémon.
ch0076_00_collector/2701_1031_03_10:
Where in the world could
they be?
ch0076_00_collector/2701_0701_01_10:
I mean, if I’m going to call myself a collector,
I at least want some Legendary Pokémon!
ch0076_00_collector/2701_0701_02_10: That’s why I’m out here traveling the world.
ch0076_00_collector/2701_0701_03_10:
But for some reason, somebody always gets there
ahead of me.
ch0076_00_collector/2701_0701_04_10:
I wonder if it could be the same person that’s
catching them all.
ch0076_00_collector/2701_0702_01_10:
Couldn’t somebody sneak a Legendary Pokémon
onto Pasio for me?
ch0076_00_collector/2701_0702_02_10:
I’d be happy to just register it in my Pokédex.
Isn’t there anybody out there who can help me...
ch0076_00_collector/2702_1031_01_10:
You can’t just be sweet to
your Pokémon all the time.
ch0076_00_collector/2702_1031_02_10:
I’ve got a Ponyta as well
as a Blastoise.
ch0076_00_collector/2702_1031_03_10:
I’m scared of fires,
you know.
ch0076_00_collector/2702_0701_02_10: I’d really like to keep him indoors.
ch0076_00_collector/2702_0701_03_10: But I’m too afraid of starting a fire, so I can’t.
ch0076_00_collector/2702_0701_04_10:
As long as Blastoise is around, we can put out
any fire.
ch0076_00_collector/2702_0702_01_10:
But when Blastoise is around, the whole house
gets flooded.
ch0076_00_collector/2702_0702_02_10:
Ooh, I know! I should just get a Vanilluxe to
freeze all the water!
ch0076_00_collector/2704_1031_02_10:
My curiosity can never
be satisfied!
ch0076_00_collector/2704_0701_01_10:
Pokémon from all over the world have gathered
here for the PML.
ch0076_00_collector/2704_0701_02_10:
My goal is to see as many different Pokémon
as I can!
ch0076_00_collector/2704_0701_03_10: I wonder what kind of Pokémon I’ll spot next.
ch0076_00_collector/2704_0701_04_10: Just thinking about it is making me crazy excited!
ch0076_00_collector/2704_0702_01_10:
I hope I can meet a Trainer who has a
Legendary Pokémon!
ch0076_00_collector/2704_0702_02_10:
If you know anyone who has one, you have
to tell me, OK?!
